oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Continental Luxury Apartments
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Mr. & Mrs. Arthur A. Danaut, Jr. -- N. Trezevant -- Memphis, 12, Tenn. -- The Continental Luxury Apartments -- Memphis’ Finest High Rise Apartments -- Lamar at Central -- In the ‘Golden Triangle’ -- 3 Bedrooms – 2 Baths -- 2 Bedrooms – 2 Baths -- 1 Bedrrom & Bachelor -- Apartments -- Balconies Swimming Pools -- Shops Underground Parking -- Electric Kitchens -- Brochure Furnished Upon Request -- Resident Manager – 1422 Lamar Ave. -- Memphis, Tenn. Phone Br 6-2261 -- Goodwyn Institute -- Nov 23 1961 --Library”
